sentences.cn: 一条绿得扎眼的连衣裙

sentences.en: He was a bilious old gentleman.
sentences.cn: 他是一位脾气乖戾的老先生.

sentences.en: His bilious temperament was apparent to all who heard him rant about his difficulties.
sentences.cn: 显然,凡听到过他对困难大声吵嚷的人,都知道他脾气暴躁.

sentences.en: I feel a little bilious after last night's dinner.
sentences.cn: 我昨天吃过晚饭后,感到有点不舒服.

sentences.en: She felt a bilious attack coming on.
She is suffering a bilious attack.
Symptoms of high gastrointestinal obstruction were severe, with bilious and large amounts of nasogastric effluent.
sentences.cn: 大量含胆汁的胃引流物表示有高度的肠道阻塞.

sentences.en: The quality or condition of being bilious.
sentences.cn: 多脂肪食物使有些人患胆汁病.

words.tran_cn: 胆的；胆汁的；输送胆汁的；由于胆汁异状的

trans.tran_cn: 胆汁的，胆汁（过多而致）病的，脾气坏的
